altTitles.en: The Duchess With an Empty Soul

altTitles.th: ใจว่างเปล่าของดัชเชส

altTitles.zh-hk: 公爵夫人的百變召喚術

description.en:
The naïve Yvona is ready to do anything for her amazing fiancé! Summon magical beasts and let him take the glory? Sure! Wreck her body for a powerful spell and die for him? Yes! Watch him secretly embrace her trusted cousin Tristan with passion and deride her openly? Oka— wait. What? Just then, Yvona dies... and wakes up a year in the past with a burdened heart. Armed with her knowledge, Yvona's ready to fight for herself. And hmm, maybe form an alliance with the coldhearted Duke of Azentine...

---
I died miserably on the day I found out the truth. The truth that my fiancé had a hidden lover, and it was my very own male cousin.

On the second morning, after my 20th birthday, a miracle happened. From that point on, I decided not to believe in love anymore. I want to have a relationship with no strings attached and without any superficial feelings such as love.

"Duke Agentine, will you marry me?"

This proposal was nothing more than a marriage to keep up appearances and without love involved.

---
[Original Webtoon](https://page.kakao.com/home?seriesId=53939289)

**Official Translations:**
* [English](https://tapas.io/series/the-soulless-duchess/)

**Official Novel Translation:** [Japanese / 日本語](https://piccoma.com/web/product/72805)
description.fr: Je suis morte misérablement, le jour où j’ai découvert la vérité. La vérité, c’est que mon fiancé avait un amant caché et c’était mon propre cousin. Le lendemain de mon 20e anniversaire, un miracle s’est produit. A partir de là, j’ai décidé de ne plus croire à l’amour. Je veux avoir une relation sans aucune condition et sans sentiments superficiels tels que l’amour. «Duke Agentine, voulez-vous m’épouser?» Cette proposition n’était rien de plus qu’un mariage pour garder les apparences et sans amour impliqué.
description.id:
Di hari kedua setelah ulang tahunku yang ke-20, sebuah keajaiban terjadi. Pada hari itu: aku mengetahui sebauh kenyataan: tunanganku memiliki selingkuhan, seorang sepupuku satu-satunya. Sejak itu, aku sudah tidak lagi percaya dengan yang namanya cinta, dan mati dengan mengenaskan.

Ketika aku terbangun, aku kembali ke masa lalu. Kali ini, aku hanya ingin memiliki hubungan tanpa adanya ikatan, dan tidak lain tidak bukan hanya karena sebuah kepentingan. Jadi, aku memberinya lamaran pernikahan, hanya untuk mencapai kepentingan bersama. "Duk Agentine, maukah kamu menikah denganku?"
description.mn: Үнэнийг олж мэдсэн тэр өдөр... Би өрөвдөлтэйгөөр нас барсан. Тэрхүү үнэн гэвэл намайг хэн бэ гэдгээр минь хардаг гэж санаж ирсэн сүйт залуу маань үеэлтэй маань янаг амрагийн холбоотой байсан гэх явдал. Би дэндүү харалган явж. Гэвч гайхамшиг биелэлээ олон, би жилийн өмнөхрүүгээ буцаж ирсэн. Энэ мөчөөс эхлэн би ахиж хайр гээч зүйлд итгэхгүй. Хэн нэгний хайрыг хүсч, түүний төлөө өөрийгөө золиослохгүй! Зөвхөн өөрийнхөө төлөө амьдрах болно!
description.pt-br: Eu morri miseravelmente, no dia em que descobri a verdade. A verdade é que meu noivo tinha um amante escondido e era meu primo.Na segunda manhã, depois do meu aniversário de 20 anos, aconteceu um milagre. A partir daí, decidi não acreditar mais no amor.Eu quero ter um relacionamento sem amarras e sem sentimentos superficiais, como o amor."Duquesa Agentine, quer se casar comigo?"Essa proposta nada mais era do que um casamento para manter as aparências e sem o amor envolvido.
